items.sentence: Tom would\'ve liked to attend Mary\'s party. Unfortunately, he had other things he had to do.
Tom didn\'t need to look at the menu because he\'d been to that restaurant many times before.
Tom looked through all his desk drawers, but he still couldn\'t find what he was looking for.
Tom can\'t work as a doctor in Australia because his qualifications aren\'t recognized there.
If only I\'d left home five minutes earlier, I would\'ve gotten to the train station in time.
